NF.Q: In the column Property Types of the sankey chart, which nodes have an outflow exceeded 370? Please list the node labels and their corresponding outflow values.
NF.A: {Single Family Home} has an outflow of {741}, {Multi-family Unit} has an outflow of {425}, {Commercial Property} has an outflow of {503}.

NF.Q: Between which pairs of nodes in column Property Types and column Buyer Types is the flow between 208 and 270? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {226} from node {Single Family Home} to {Family}.

NF.Q: In the sankey chart, which links have a flow between 148 and 370? Please list the source node, target node, and their corresponding flow values.
NF.A: There is a flow of {226} from node {Single Family Home} to {Family}, a flow of {315} from node {Multi-family Unit} to {Retiree}, a flow of {191} from node {Commercial Property} to {Family}.

NC.Q: Between the flows from node Commercial Property to node Retiree and from node Townhouse to node Family, which path has a larger flow?
NC.A: The flow from node {Commercial Property} to node {Retiree} is larger.

NC.Q: Among the flows from node Commercial Property to node Retiree, from node Multi-family Unit to node Family, and from node Townhouse to node Family, which path has the largest flow?
NC.A: The flow from node {Commercial Property} to node {Retiree} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which node in the column Buyer Types of the sankey chart is the most critical?
MSR.A: The most critical node in the column Buyer Types is {Retiree}.

MSR.Q: What is the path with the highest total flow from source node Multi-family Unit to target node Retiree? Please list all node labels along this path.
MSR.A: The path with the highest total flow from node Multi-family Unit to node Retiree is: {Multi-family Unit, Retiree}.
